item.name: Cowrock Vineyards
item.address1: 28 Dequetteville Terrace, Kent Town DC, SA 5067 (postal)
item.description: Global Wine Ventures Ltd is the phoenix arisen from the ashes of Xanadu Wines Ltd. The wines will be predominantly sourced from the 44-ha Cowrock Vineyard, situated 20 km south of the Margaret River township. Distribution in Australia is through Red+White, and it is anticipated exports will follow in the US, the UK and select parts of Asia.
